landing.we-connect: We connect corporate customers with verified event venues and service providers
landing.partnering-text: Partnering with leading institutions in Azerbaijan
landing.ht-managers-text: Organize team buildings, corporate parties, and company events without the headache
landing.office-managers-text: Book venues, activities, and services in minutes to make every office gathering seamless
landing.organizational-developers-text: Easily deliver unforgettable corporate experiences with verified partners and packages
landing.enterprise-teams-text: Strengthen company culture through engaging off-site events and tailored team experiences
landing.building-first-event-ecosystem-text: Olsun is the first corporate event marketplace, which connects corporate customers with verified event venues and service providers through curated packages, saving 10+ hours per event and delivering 10-15% cost savings
landing.event-planning-shouldnt-consume: Event Planning shouldn't consume your entire week
landing.curated-marketplace-text: Browse 20+ pre-vetted venues, service providers and vendors in one platform. Filter by budget, capacity and location instantly
landing.streamlined-booking-text: Book your entire corporate event in one flow — from venue to entertainment — with just a few clicks
landing.verified-trusted-text: All partners pre-vetted by our team. Quality guaranteed or we find alternatives immediately. A reliable platform for making corporate transfers
landing.problem-hours-wasted-text: Calling 20+ vendors, scrolling Instagram endlessly, coordinating across WhatsApp groups—event planning consumes 10+ hours per event
landing.problem-quality-assurance-text: Unreliable vendors, hidden costs, last-minute cancellations—finding trustworthy partners feels like gambling
landing.problem-fragmented-process-text: Juggling multiple tools, spreadsheets, and platforms makes coordination chaotic and error-prone

get-in-touch.title: Get in Touch
get-in-touch.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

footer.your-partners-seamless: Your partner in seamless event management
footer.supported-by: Supported by Ministry of Culture | CulTech Incubation Program
